'Okay! Time for our next song!!'%K%P
'Make sure you follow along with us\ntill the very end!'%K%P
Garbed in her L☆SEVEN outfit, Kagura was dancing,\non the screen before me, a big smile on her face.%K%P
That's right, she did it...\nShe aced the final audition.%K%P
'Come on, let's kick this up a notch!'%K%P
'We're gonna take this to all new heights!'%K%P
And it wasn't just that she passed.%K%P
Her spectacular show of skill had earned her\nthe place of the group's center spot.%K%P
She filled the spot left when Sara quit,\nand was now a brand new superstar idol.%K%P
'Alright, now we're really going.\nBut we're not there yet!'%K%P
At her calls, all the fans let out\nwhoops and hollers, cheering for her.%K%P
It was hard to even recall the days when she had\nonce worked in a goddess cafe in Akiba.%K%P
'I feel like you're getting farther and\nfarther away from me...'%K%P
'Oh, come on now.'%K%P
She laughed off my worries.%K%P
When I looked at her,\nshe was smiling back at me.%K%P
'I'm right here, aren't I?\nRight by your side.'%K%P
'Yeah, I know, but...'%K%P
It was the first bit of spare time we had together\nsince she joined L☆SEVEN.%K%P
That's why we had snuck away\non a bit of a secret date.%K%P
'Still though, you've really become something.\nA real-deal idol.'%K%P
'Hehe, thanks.\nIt still doesn't really feel real.'%K%P
'I'm just sort of doing\nwhat I've always done anyway, you know?'%K%P
'That's just like you.'%K%P
'That just means you've always been good enough,\nright from the start.'%K%P
'You're probably the only one who would say that.'%K%P
'Really though, I've got a lot of work to do\nif I want to reach out to more and more people.'%K%P
'I so don't want to lose to Shuri, either.'%K%P
She said this with\nan extra bit of oomph to her words.%K%P
Even Shuri had managed to make her way\ninto L☆SEVEN.%K%P
The performance she displayed had been\nequally as spectacular.%K%P
The judges probably all thought it would be a waste\nto turn her away after that.%K%P
'But, aren't you glad about it all?\nThe fact that you two can perform together again?'%K%P
'Yeah, now we can definitely reach out\nto even more fans.'%K%P
Really, Kagura's dream was not simply to\nget in as a member of L☆SEVEN.%K%P
What she really wanted was to work together\nwith Shuri again.%K%P
'I'll be here for you all the way.'%K%P
'Thanks, Yamato. It means a lot.'%K%P
I didn't even mind that this bright, smiling face of\nhers was no longer just mine to enjoy.%K%P
If she was happy, I was happy.%K%P
I would do anything to\nput a smile on that face of hers.%K%P
'Anyway, I'm no idol today.'%K%P
'Today, I'm just your girlfriend!'%K%P
She gave me a cute little wink.\nShe was a goddess, an idol and my girlfriend...%K%P
And I knew I wanted to be there\nfor her through it all.%K%P
As her fan and as her boyfriend...%K%P
